title: LGBT Community Conference
description: Cambridgeshire Constabulary are hosting an LGBT community conference on Wednesday 8th February 2017. There will be speakers from within Cambridgeshire police and from other representatives of the community. The theme is ‘Comunity with the impact homophic/bi-phobic/transphobic bullying’ being discussed, as well as mental health awareness and hate crime, amongst other issues. Should you wish to attend, spaces are limited so please contact T/DC Emma Seddon at emma.seddon@cambs.pnn.police.uk with the reason for your interest and your position in the LGBT community.
